text:
//Crosshair
cl_crosshair_drawoutline "0"
cl_crosshair_dynamic_maxdist_splitratio "0.35"
cl_crosshair_dynamic_splitalpha_innermod "1"
cl_crosshair_dynamic_splitalpha_outermod "0.5"
cl_crosshair_dynamic_splitdist "7"
cl_crosshair_outlinethickness "2.500000"
cl_crosshair_sniper_show_normal_inaccuracy "0"
cl_crosshair_sniper_width "1"
cl_crosshair_t "0"
cl_crosshairalpha "255"
cl_crosshaircolor "5"
cl_crosshaircolor_b "255"
cl_crosshaircolor_g "255"
cl_crosshaircolor_r "255"
cl_crosshairdot "0"
cl_crosshairgap "-6.500000"
cl_crosshairgap_useweaponvalue "0"
cl_crosshairscale "0"
cl_crosshairsize "2.000000"
cl_crosshairstyle "5"
cl_crosshairthickness "1.000000"
cl_crosshairusealpha "1"
cl_fixedcrosshairgap "3"

//Viewmodel
cl_viewmodel_shift_left_amt "1.5"
cl_viewmodel_shift_right_amt "0.75"
viewmodel_fov "60"
viewmodel_offset_x "1"
viewmodel_offset_y "1"
viewmodel_offset_z "-1"
viewmodel_presetpos "0"
cl_bob_lower_amt "21"
cl_bobamt_lat "0.4"
cl_bobamt_vert "0.25"
cl_bobcycle "0.98"

//HUD
cl_hud_background_alpha "0.500000"
cl_hud_bomb_under_radar "1"
cl_hud_color "1"
cl_hud_healthammo_style "0"
cl_hud_playercount_pos "0"
cl_hud_playercount_showcount "0"
cl_hud_radar_scale "1"
hud_scaling "0.650000"
hud_showtargetid "1"
hud_takesshots "0"
cl_radar_always_centered "1"
cl_radar_icon_scale_min "0.6"
cl_radar_rotate "1"
cl_radar_scale "0.7"
cl_radar_square_with_scoreboard "1"
cl_radar_always_centered "1"
cl_radar_icon_scale_min "0.6"
cl_radar_rotate "1"
cl_radar_scale "0.7"
cl_radar_square_with_scoreboard "1"
net_graph "1"
net_graphpos "1"
net_graphproportionalfont "1"
cl_loadout_colorweaponnames "1"

//FPS Scoreboard 
net_graph "1"
net_graphheight "9999"
alias "+scorenet" "+showscores; net_graphheight 0"
alias "-scorenet" "-showscores; net_graphheight 9999"
bind "TAB" "+scorenet"

//Jump
bind "MWHEELUP" "+jump"
bind "MWHEELDOWN" "+jump"
bind "Space" "+jump"

//VoiceMute Script
bind "uparrow" "voice_enable 1; chat_enable 1; echo Voice ON"
bind "downarrow" "voice_enable 0; chat_enable 0; echo Voice OFF"

//Left & Right hand
bind "rightarrow" "cl_righthand 1"
bind "leftarrow" "cl_righthand 0"

//Smoke Cross
alias smoke smoke1
alias smoke1 "cl_crosshairsize 999; alias smoke smoke2"
alias smoke2 "cl_crosshairsize 3; alias smoke smoke1"
bind "n" "smoke"

//Damage
developer "1"
con_filter_enable "2"
con_filter_text_out "Player:"
con_filter_text "Damage"

//Binds
bind "shift" "+speed;r_cleardecals"
bind "Ctrl" "+duck;r_cleardecals"
Bind "," "say Good Luck Have Fun!"
Bind "." "say Good Game Ez!"



Clear
title: Config_JacoB
